messages.greeting_message: Hello! We noticed your comment. How can we assist you? (with button 'Want'')
non_subscribed_messages: Hey! You are not subscribed yet!
Please subscribe to our channel to get access to all our content.
Click 'Subscribe' button to get access to all our content.
messages.subscribed_message: Thank you you are with me! (with button 'Watch')
messages.await_message: I`m still waiting for your action!
